text: Ruckman is an unincorporated community farming community in Hampshire County in the U.S. state of West Virginia. Ruckman is located at the intersections of Ash Ruckman Road (WV Secondary Route 7/4) with J.C. Ruckman (WV Secondary Route 12/6) and Edgar Loy (WV Secondary Route 7/7) Roads south of Augusta and northeast of Kirby. It is named for the Ruckman family that is still prevalent in the area. Ruckman's post office is no longer in operation. ==External links== *Ruckman Mill Farm == References == Category:Unincorporated communities in Hampshire County, West Virginia Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia
title: Ruckman, West Virginia
